steps.action: Assess for life-threatening bleeding. If at any time the patient has life-threatening bleeding, control the hemorrhage with any available resource (including the use of tourniquet or hemostatic dressing as appropriate).
Activate EMS, rapid response or resuscitation team, Check breathing and pulse for no more than 10 sec, At the same time, scan the body for life-threatening bleeding
